short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Countdown to your Date shows the number of days, hours, minutes and seconds left until your date, along with your message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Countdown to your Date shows the number of days, hours, minutes and seconds left until the New Year, Valentine's day, Christmas or any other date that you specify. This extension also shows some Valentine , New Year, Christmas or your own message.  The quotes are taken from few notable authors, artists, writers, scientists and  movies from the web.
